examples.example: 我的雇主是一位非常友善且通情达理的人，我很庆幸能与他一起工作。

translate.english: My employer is a very friendly and reasonable person, and I am very glad to be able to work with him.

examples.example: 我的雇主常常鼓励我们不断进取，给予我们很多提升的机会。

translate.english: My employer often encourages us to keep making progress and gives us a lot of opportunities for improvement.

examples.example: 我的雇主总是以积极乐观的态度对待工作，营造了良好的工作氛围。

translate.english: My employer always treats work with a positive and optimistic attitude, creating a good working atmosphere.
